title: Remove single leading whitespace before hero intro text

requirements.text: In `frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx`, remove the single leading whitespace that appears before the intro paragraph text that begins with “Hello there, and welcome…”, while keeping the existing white-background intro box styling and leaving spacing after the message unchanged.

quotes: Yes, that one-spabe before the words, "Hello there and welcome...." Only remove the one-space (before). For the (after) -- with no space, keep it as-is!

acceptanceCriteria: The rendered intro paragraph begins immediately with the letter “H” in “Hello”, with no visible leading space/indent before the first character.
No additional whitespace is added after the intro message; the layout below the intro block remains visually unchanged.
The intro block’s existing styling (including its background/border/spacing classes) remains unchanged aside from eliminating the leading whitespace artifact.

constraints: Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Backend changes are not required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not restore or modify the audio player / audio-file setting bar in this change (it is explicitly paused).
Do not rewrite or reformat the intro message text content beyond removing the single leading whitespace character.
